message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $120. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I understand you're on a tight budget, but I really need to make a profit on this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $160. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love the product!
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $160 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm willing to go up to $140. Let's try to make this work.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to be responsible with your budget. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I really need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm thinking $155 is a fair price for this amazing product. What do you think?
